page.title: 03TONEDALE continued
page.content: {HOUSING }There are several small estates,some older terraced houses which housed the workers for the mill {SPRINGFIELD & RIVERSIDE},now privately owned.{COUNCIL ESTATES},Crosslands & Tonedale{NEW ESTATE}Barratts, made up of flats and small houses. { PRIVATE HOUSES}bigger houses & bungalows which line the main road-Station Road & High Path. {EMPLOYMENT}This is an area with quite a lot of concentrated employment centered around Aerosol International & Relyon.Other businesses include: D.I.Y. Building Supplies. Sewage Works Metal Manufacturing. Tone Motor Services. D.I.Y.Timber. Wellington Mo- tors.Tonedale Farm. Longforth Farm. Mr. Olly Drinks.Marglen. {LANDSCAPE.}Farm land.Pond. Private Fishing.Allotment gardens. Remains of the Great Western Canal.
